author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Remove BSC from Phase2 scenario and will be used in any new scenarios from now on. It is now used in the new scenarios 2026D89 and 2026D90

#### PR validation:

Use the runTheMatrix test workflows 39834.0 and 40234.0

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-gex106 Remove BSC from Phase2 scenario and will be used in any new scenarios from now on
